item.description:
I'm horror a movie buff and I know their are other horror movie fans in this group. Let's get together and watch Sinister and grab drinks afterwards. It received pretty good reviews on Rotten Tomatoes. The trailers have made the movie appealing. The summary of the movie is below:

"Sinister is a frightening new thriller from the producer of the Paranormal Activity films and the writer-director of The Exorcism of Emily Rose. Ethan Hawke plays a true crime novelist who discovers a box of mysterious, disturbing home movies that plunge his family into a nightmarish experience of supernatural horror."

We will be seeing the 4:45pm show. We are meeting in the lobby at 4:15pm.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the lobby area at 4:15pm
item.name: Sinister
